See how your photo could turn into a fresh, styled braid look. It's free, fun, and surprisingly accurate.

isRightSection.title: Are Braids a Good Match for Your Hair & Face?
textContent: Wondering if braided hairstyles are right for you? Let's find out. The shape of your skull and your hairline play a big part in how braids look on you. For instance, round or oval faces usually rock box braids and cornrows. Braids also work differently depending on your hair type and density—fine hair might feel heavy with thick braids, while curly, thick, or afro-textured hair thrives in protective braids like dreadlocks or fishtail braids.

Braids aren't just trendy; they help protect your hair, keep it neat, and showcase your personality. Still worried? With Hairstyle AI, you can try realistic braids before you commit. You won't have to stress about styling or upkeep before you know it's the right fit.
Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to confidence.

additionalSection.title: How to Keep Your Braids Looking Fresh
textContent: A braids looks neat—but it needs some love! First, trim your braids every 4–6 weeks. This keeps the ends sharp and the shape clean. Use a light shampoo and a smoothing conditioner to fight frizz, especially if you have wavy or thick hair.

Can you just let it air-dry? Sure—but it depends. Some hair dries beautifully on its own, especially if it's straight or lightly wavy. If not, a quick blow-dry with a round brush can help your braids sit right.

Don't forget heat protection! Worried your braids might look too plain or 'old'? Add side bangs, go for layers, or try a fun color. With the right tweaks, your braids can be soft, trendy, or even bold. And hey—if you want to test before you cut, try it on HairstyleAI first!

image.alt: box braid maintenance tips and styling

howToUseSection.title: How to Try Braids with Hairstyle AI
howToUseSection.description: It only takes a minute to see how braids look on you. Just follow these simple steps. No downloads, no sign-ups, no worries. Try it out — risk-free and totally free.

steps.title: Step 1: Upload Your Photo
steps.description: Choose a clear photo with your face visible. Make sure your face is centered, facing forward, and well-lit. Supported formats include PNG, JPG, or JPEG. The image size must be under 3MB. No filters, no sunglasses — the more natural, the better. Hairstyle AI needs a clean view to give you the most accurate braid look.

steps.title: Step 2: Pick Your Braid Style & Color
steps.description: Try various braided hairstyles like box braids, cornrows, or fishtail braids. You can also try 19 different hair colors — from natural tones to bold shades. Tap to preview each style. Choose what feels right for your face shape and mood.

steps.title: Step 3: Generate with AI
steps.description: Click the "Generate" button and let the AI do the magic. Our AI-powered face analyzer maps your hairline, face shape, and features to apply the braid realistically. This step takes about 1 minute — grab a snack and come back to your new look.

steps.title: Step 4: Download & Share
steps.description: Once it's ready, download your new braid look straight to your device. Want to show it off? Share it with your friends, post it on Instagram or TikTok, or just save it for your next salon visit. Your photo will be deleted immediately after processing — we don't store your data.

image.alt: How to use braids filter - step by step demonstration

ctaSections.title: Planning Your Next Hair Appointment
ctaSections.description: Thinking about getting cornrows or box braids but not sure if they suit you? Use Hairstyle AI before heading to the salon. Upload your photo, try different braid styles, and find the one that fits your face best. This way, you avoid hairstyle regret and walk into your appointment with confidence. Plus, you can show the result to your hairstylist for reference — it's like bringing your future hair with you.

image.alt: cornrows braid appointment - braid transformation before and after

ctaSections.title: Creating Social Media Content
ctaSections.description: Want a new look for your profile pic or a fun reel without actually changing your hair? Hairstyle AI is perfect for content creators. Try on braids, snap a screenshot, and post it to Instagram, Snapchat, or TikTok. Whether it's a joke, a challenge, or a transformation post, your followers will love it — and you stay totally commitment-free.

image.alt: Social media content - fun braid transformation for posts

ctaSections.title: Exploring Styles for Hair Loss Recovery
ctaSections.description: Going through hair thinning or regrowth? You might be unsure which style helps you feel your best. Braids can be protective and empowering—but only if they work for your current hair situation. Use our AI braids filter to explore what's possible and find a look that makes you feel confident. Play with 19 different braid colors — from natural blacks to vibrant reds or soft blondes. You might be surprised what color brings out your confidence. No pressure, no risk, and totally private.

image.alt: Hair loss recovery - confident person with braids

features.title: Easy & Free to Use
features.description: No sign-up. No payments. Just upload your photo and click "Generate." You get 5 free braid try-ons every day. It's the simplest way to preview new hairstyles — no salon visit needed.

features.title: Tons of Styles & Colors
features.description: Try over 60 AI hairstyles — from box braids to cornrows — and 19 color options. Whether you're bold, classic, or curious, there's a perfect braid filter waiting for your face.

features.title: Looks Super Realistic
features.description: Our AI uses smart face mapping to match the braid to your real hairline, skull shape, and lighting. The results are shockingly natural — like you actually got braided!

features.title: Private & Safe
features.description: Your photo is never saved. Once the braid is generated and shown to you, the image is instantly deleted. No data storage. No risk. Just a safe, secure style test.

faqConfig.question: Can I change the braid size or color in the AI Braids Filter?
faqConfig.answer: You can change the braid style and color with Hairstyle AI, but not the size of a specific braid. Each style comes with a preset size designed for realistic fit. Just pick a different braid type or color before clicking "Generate."

faqConfig.question: What if the braids don't look right on my photo?
faqConfig.answer: Try uploading a clearer photo with good lighting and no filters. Our AI works best with front-facing, natural images.

faqConfig.question: Can I try more than one braid style on the same photo?
faqConfig.answer: Yes! After generating your first look, just go back, select a different braid style, and hit "Generate" again. You can reuse the same photo as long as it's still within the 5 free tries per day. It's a fun way to explore multiple braid looks without re-uploading each time.

faqConfig.question: Is the AI Braids Filter available on mobile devices?
faqConfig.answer: Yes. Hairstyle AI works perfectly on most smartphones and tablets. Just open the site in your browser—no app needed. You can upload, customize, and generate braid styles from your phone in just a few taps. It's fast, free, and works wherever you are.

faqConfig.question: How realistic is the AI Braids Filter?
faqConfig.answer: The AI Braids Filter is powered by smart face-mapping technology. It detects your hairline, skull shape, lighting, and face angle to place braids where they would naturally fall. The result looks incredibly real — like a virtual salon try-on that's photo-ready.

faqConfig.question: Is it for all genders and ages?
faqConfig.answer: Yes. Hairstyle AI is built for everyone — women, men, non-binary, and all gender expressions. Whether you're 16 or 60, as long as your face is clear and visible in the photo, our AI will create a custom braid look that fits your unique features.

faqConfig.question: Is AI Braids Filter free?
faqConfig.answer: Yes! Hairstyle AI is completely free to use. You get 5 braid style tries per day at no cost. No sign-up, no subscription, no app to download. It's the easiest and most budget-friendly way to test new hairstyles online.

faqConfig.question: Can I try other hairstyles too?
faqConfig.answer: Yes！ Hairstyle AI isn't just about braids. You can also explore short cuts, fades, long styles, and trendy looks — all in one place. Just upload your photo once and switch between styles anytime to find what really suits you.

faqConfig.question: What if I have thin or unique hair? Can AI still match it?
faqConfig.answer: Yes. The AI doesn't rely on your real hair texture. Instead, it uses your face shape and scalp area to place the braid style. Whether your hair is thin, curly, or afro-textured, the filter adjusts automatically to create a realistic and flattering fit.

faqConfig.question: How accurate is it with skull shape and hairline?
faqConfig.answer: Very accurate. Our AI maps your face landmarks, including your hairline, cheekbones, and forehead shape. That's why braids appear naturally placed—even around uneven or unique hairlines. The result is a look that feels tailored to your actual head shape.

faqConfig.question: Are braids protective hairstyles?
faqConfig.answer: Yes, braids are considered a protective hairstyle. They help reduce hair breakage, limit daily manipulation, and keep moisture sealed in. Many people with textured or curly hair choose braids to support healthy hair growth while staying stylish.

faqConfig.question: How long do braids last and when will my hair grow back?
faqConfig.answer: Braids usually last 4 to 8 weeks depending on care and style. Your natural hair grows about ½ inch per month, so after removing the braids, you'll likely see noticeable growth. Just remember to moisturize and avoid pulling too tightly during the grow-out phase.

faqConfig.question: Does 'AI Braids' mean anything else?
faqConfig.answer: Yes. "AI Braids" might also remind people of NBA star Allen Iverson's iconic cornrows or even AI-based software used in other industries.
